Dating: NEW KINGDOM (not before); LATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Ostracon
Description: A small limestone ostracon with a scene incised on it. The god Amun stands at the left facing a sphinx. Above the two figures is a bird with outstretched wings, possibly the vulture goddess Nekhbet. Amun holds a staff in his left hand and the sphinx wears an uraeus and false beard. The workmanship is rough and this is probably an artist's practice piece.
